title: 103: Roll Red Roll
itunes:title: Roll Red Roll
description:
In Steubenville, Ohio, high school football players are untouchable. So when two players are accused of assaulting an underage girl at a pre-season party, it seems almost impossible to get the real story. But when an amateur crime blogger uncovers disturbing evidence on the players’ social media accounts, the town—and quickly the country—are forced to face what these boys have done. With unprecedented access to police documents, exhibits, and evidence, the documentary feature unflinchingly asks: "why didn't anyone stop it?"
